whatIs.title: What is Revolutionary Farmers?
whatIs.description: Revolutionary Farmers is a decentralized platform that provides trust and transparency in agricultural transactions using blockchain technology. We connect farmers with buyers, ensuring fair trade, secure transactions, and traceability of products.

smartContracts.title: Smart Contracts
smartContracts.description: Secure payments and transactions through blockchain technology.

trustSystem.title: Verified Trust System
trustSystem.description: Built-in reputation system for farmers and buyers.

listProducts.title: List Products
listProducts.description: Farmers can list their products for sale with complete transparency.

receiveOrders.title: Receive Orders
receiveOrders.description: Get notified when buyers place orders on your listed products.

prepareShipment.title: Prepare Shipment
prepareShipment.description: Package and send the products through verified logistics partners.

browsePurchase.title: Browse & Purchase
browsePurchase.description: Buyers can explore a variety of fresh products and place orders.

securePayment.title: Secure Payment
securePayment.description: Payments are secured using blockchain technology and smart contracts.

deliveryTracking.title: Delivery & Tracking
deliveryTracking.description: Products are delivered with real-time tracking and transparency.
